title: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding
description: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
OB: When the key is left blank in the properties file, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
EB: When the key is left blank in the properties file, the externalized text should still be displayed in the chart title.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Leave the key blank in the properties file.
2. Verify that the externalized text is not displayed in the chart title.
